summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Smart Nutrition Hub AI-Powered Fitness Tracker MVP. All major features tested successfully with 100% backend API success rate and functional frontend integration.
passed_tests: Backend API Testing (19/19 tests passed - 100% success rate)
AI Food Recognition with Gemini Vision (working with proper image formats)
Manual Food Logging with complete nutrition tracking
Water Tracking with quick log functionality
AI Diet Coach with Gemini text model (generated personalized meal plans)
Analytics and Progress Tracking with charts
Workout Library with video content and filtering
Dashboard with live data display and AI insights
Backend-Frontend Integration (data persistence and real-time updates)
Responsive UI with dark theme and electric orange accents

success_percentage.integration: 100% (perfect data flow between backend and frontend)
success_percentage.ai_features: 100% (Gemini Vision food analysis and Diet Coach working)
